product.name: Target gender
product.description: Identifies the intended gender for a product, such as female, male or unisex

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Audio connectivity
product.description: Defines the types of audio connection a product supports, such as HDMI or USB

product.name: Connectivity technology
product.description: Defines the method of data transfer in a product, e.g. Bluetooth, USB

product.name: Headphone style
product.description: Defines the design headphones, e.g. behind-the-neck, earbuds

product.name: Microphone type
product.description: Defines the microphone technology used, such as condenser or dynamic

product.name: Device interface
product.description: Specifies the method of connection between electronic devices, e.g. HDMI, USB

product.name: Polar pattern
product.description: Indicates the sound pick-up orientation of a microphone, such as omnidirectional or cardioid

product.name: Power source
product.description: Specifies the power source a product uses to operate, such as solar or batteries

product.name: Data network
product.description: Specifies the data network compatibility of mobile devices, like LTE or 3G

product.name: Operating system
product.description: Defines the system software a device uses, such as iOS or ChromeOS

product.name: Display resolution
product.description: Defines resolution of a digital display, e.g. 1280 x 1024, full HD

product.name: Battery technology
product.description: Specifies the type of battery used in electronics, such as alkaline or lithium-ion

product.name: Cosmetic condition
product.description: Defines the wear and condition of electronics, e.g. new, opened-never used

product.name: SIM card capability
product.description: Indicates the type of SIM card configuration in mobile devices, e.g. dual, embedded

product.name: Subscription type
product.description: Specifies the type of subscription, typically for mobile devices; e.g. pay as you go, pre-paid

product.name: Removable storage formats supported
product.description: Defines the removable storage formats a device is compatible with, e.g. SD, microUSB

product.name: SIM card type 2
product.description: Specifies compatible SIM card format for a mobile phone's slot 2, such as a Nano SIM

product.name: Search product boosts
product.description: List of search queries for which a product gets higher rank in search results

product.name: Related products
product.description: List of related products

product.name: Related products settings
product.description: Determines how related products are displayed along with algorithmic product recommendations

product.name: Complementary products
product.description: List of complementary products
